name: LANG ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE, INC
description: Developer of language processing platform designed to automate unstructured text workflows. The company's platform is created using artificial intelligence with intent customization, real-time self-supervised classifier, and the help of algorithm preprocessing it is of great help for tokenization, lemmatization, intent induction, and features extraction, and deeper intents, enabling business operators to get automatic maintenance which also focuses on cost optimization and can be installed anywhere.
one_liner: Developer of language processing platform designed to automate unstructured text workflows. The company's platform is created using artificial intelligence with intent customization, real-time self-supervised classifier, and the help of algorithm preprocessing it is of great help for tokenization, lemmatization, intent induction, and features extraction, and deeper intents, enabling business operators to get automatic maintenance which also focuses on cost optimization and can be installed anywhere.
